items.text_for_match: Marseille duo's row was like 'bar fight' - De Zerbi Marseille boss Roberto de Zerbi says team-mates Adrien Rabiot and Jonathan Rowe were placed on the transfer list after an altercation that was like a "bar fight". Marseille boss Roberto de Zerbi says team-mates Adrien Rabiot and Jonathan Rowe were placed on the transfer list after an altercation that was like a "bar fight".

items.ja: Orlando Pride sign Ovalle for £1.1m record fee
items.en: Orlando Pride sign Ovalle for £1.1m record fee
items.text_for_match: Orlando Pride sign Ovalle for £1.1m record fee Orlando Pride make Lizbeth Ovalle the most expensive signing in women's football history by signing the Mexico winger from Tigres UANL.
